title: Why oh why did it had to be supernatural
review:
The movie is a ten till Steve is set on fire. After that scene it is nothing more than just another ordinary horror! movie.
Great acting, wonderful scenery and thrilling atmosphere.

title: Waste of time
review:
So boring, soooo predictable.
Cheesy story and a subject filmed so many many times. I was fooled by the rating, just run.

title: Could be much better
review:
Too shallow for an artist breaking free.
Apart from this, why is there no movie of Janis Joplin?
